en.title: FE Donates Baht 200,000 to Pibulsonggram Foundation, Thailand 29th March 2008
en.content: FE is honoured to donate Baht 200,000 to Pibulsonggram Foundation of Thailand. The donation was accepted by H.E Former Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr. Nitya Pibulsonggram and witnessed by H.E Malaysia Ambassador Dato Shaarani Ibrahim and General Dato Kitti Ratanachaya. The Pibulsonggram Foundation was set up in recognition and in memory of H.E Mr. Nitya Pibulsonggram’s parents Field Marshal P. Pibulsonggram and Lady La-iad Pibulsonggram. Field Marshal Pibulsonggram was the third Prime Minister of Thailand.
